allow: Bash(cd /d/manager-comediante/backend && npx prisma migrate dev --name init 2>&1)
Bash(cd D:/manager-comediante/backend && PGPASSWORD=admin123 psql -U postgres -d comediantes_db -c "SELECT email, role, is_active FROM users;" 2>&1)
Bash(cd D:/manager-comediante/backend && npx prisma db push 2>&1)
Bash(cd D:/manager-comediante/backend && npx prisma db push 2>&1 && npx prisma generate 2>&1)
Bash(cd D:/manager-comediante/backend && npx prisma migrate dev --name add_reviews 2>&1)

Bash(cd D:/manager-comediante/backend && PGPASSWORD=admin123 psql -h localhost -U postgres -d comediantes_db -c "SELECT id, name, slug, parent_id, sort_order FROM categories ORDER BY parent_id NULLS FIRST, sort_order;" 2>&1)
Bash(cd D:/manager-comediante/frontend && npx shadcn@latest add popover command -y 2>&1)
Bash(cd D:/manager-comediante/frontend && npx shadcn@latest add popover command --overwrite 2>&1)
Bash(cd D:/manager-comediante/frontend && npx shadcn@latest add popover --overwrite 2>&1)
